cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: calm
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{ssh_pub_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:nutanix/4u
    calm:nutanix/4u
  expire: False

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: calm
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{ssh_pub_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:nutanix/4u
    calm:nutanix/4u
  expire: False

variable_list.name: app_list
variable_list.label: Please provide an application to replace
